gamerule.allowTradingHearts.description: allow players to trade their hearts
gamerule.tntActivateCombatmode.descripti: if true, Tnt will activate the combat mode.
gamerule.sendSoulAmuletInformation.descr: when a soul amulet is crafted/dropped/used/picked up it gets sent into the chat
